use MPC HC (media player classic home cinema) play a 1080p bd rip and then pause it , right click anywhere on the video player screen and go to video frame and then select stretch to window and this will make all ur illegally downloaded videos play without black bars except if they are hard coded but it has a pan and scan feature that allows you to crop out the hard coded black bars easily
